ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Your mistaken. : )  You can buff them all you want. As to if they disabled it or not, I dont know. Mu 57 Enchanter Tunare Server ... From: Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
Your mistaken. : ) You can buff them all you want. As to if they disabled
it or not, I dont know.

Mu
57 Enchanter
Tunare Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 08, 2001 10:08 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


At 08:31 AM 11/8/2001 -0300, you wrote:
>Here is an interesting thing to think about. I have a Higher lvl enchanter
>on a PvP server. My brother logs on as a monster in and tells me (we are
in
>the same house) what zone he is in. I find him, charm him and then buff
him
>to no end. Wait till charm wears off and watch him go rabid on
unsuspecting
>newbies. Sounds like it could be a problem to me.

I could be mistaken, but I don't think you can buff charmed pets. Even if
you can - a LOT of the "standard" monster rules are suspended for the
monster class. For example, you can't give them a weapon. Like Atonal
pointed out, there's also a serious lack of "survivability." And
ultimately, if (god forbid) someone went to the great trouble to do this -
remember, it's a PVP okay server. In other words, this falls under the
"appropriate" guidelines.

Talies


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
